metadata.description: Deploys a GPU-enabled VM for Starship Horizons Learning AI with NVIDIA drivers, Docker, Ollama, and Whisper
SSH public key or password for the VM
Git repository URL to clone (leave empty to skip)
Whisper model size for audio transcription
Ollama LLM model for report generation
Allowed source IP addresses for web access (comma-separated or * for all)

variables.cloudInitScript:
[concat('#cloud-config
package_update: true
package_upgrade: true

packages:
  - apt-transport-https
  - ca-certificates
  - curl
  - gnupg
  - lsb-release
  - git
  - ffmpeg
  - python3-pip
  - jq

write_files:
  - path: /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/start-app.sh
    permissions: "0755"
    owner: ', parameters('adminUsername'), ':', parameters('adminUsername'), '
    content: |
      #!/bin/bash
      set -e
      echo "=== Starting Starship Horizons Learning AI ==="
      
      cd /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/app
      
      # Build Docker image
      echo "Building Docker image..."
      docker build -t sh-learning-ai .
      
      # Stop existing container if running
      docker stop sh-learning-ai 2>/dev/null || true
      docker rm sh-learning-ai 2>/dev/null || true
      
      # Run container with GPU support
      echo "Starting container..."
      docker run -d \
        --gpus all \
        -p ', string(parameters('webServerPort')), ':', string(parameters('webServerPort')), ' \
        --name sh-learning-ai \
        -e WHISPER_MODEL=', parameters('whisperModel'), ' \
        -e OLLAMA_MODEL=', parameters('ollamaModel'), ' \
        -v /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/ollama-models:/root/.ollama \
        --restart unless-stopped \
        sh-learning-ai
      
      echo "=== Application started ==="
      echo "Web interface: http://$(curl -s ifconfig.me):', string(parameters('webServerPort')), '"
      echo "View logs: docker logs -f sh-learning-ai"

  - path: /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/check-status.sh
    permissions: "0755"
    owner: ', parameters('adminUsername'), ':', parameters('adminUsername'), '
    content: |
      #!/bin/bash
      echo "=== System Status ==="
      echo ""
      echo "GPU Status:"
      nvidia-smi --query-gpu=name,memory.used,memory.total --format=csv 2>/dev/null || echo "GPU not available"
      echo ""
      echo "Docker Containers:"
      docker ps --format "table {{.Names}}\t{{.Status}}\t{{.Ports}}"
      echo ""
      echo "Application Health:"
      curl -s http://localhost:', string(parameters('webServerPort')), '/api/health | jq . 2>/dev/null || echo "Application not responding"

runcmd:
  # Install NVIDIA drivers and container toolkit
  - distribution=$(. /etc/os-release;echo $ID$VERSION_ID)
  - curl -fsSL https://nvidia.github.io/libnvidia-container/gpgkey | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/nvidia-container-toolkit-keyring.gpg
  - curl -s -L https://nvidia.github.io/libnvidia-container/$distribution/libnvidia-container.list | sed "s#deb https://#deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/nvidia-container-toolkit-keyring.gpg] https://#g" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nvidia-container-toolkit.list
  - apt-get update
  - apt-get install -y nvidia-driver-535 nvidia-container-toolkit
  
  # Install Docker
  - curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com | sh
  - systemctl enable docker
  - systemctl start docker
  - usermod -aG docker ', parameters('adminUsername'), '
  
  # Configure NVIDIA runtime for Docker
  - nvidia-ctk runtime configure --runtime=docker
  - systemctl restart docker
  
  # Create Ollama models directory (persisted outside container)
  - mkdir -p /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/ollama-models
  - chown ', parameters('adminUsername'), ':', parameters('adminUsername'), ' /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/ollama-models
  
  # Clone repository
  - ', if(empty(parameters('gitRepoUrl')), 'echo "No git repo specified - clone manually to /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/app"', concat('cd /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), ' && git clone ', parameters('gitRepoUrl'), ' app && chown -R ', parameters('adminUsername'), ':', parameters('adminUsername'), ' app')), '

final_message: |
  ===========================================
  Cloud-init completed!
  ===========================================
  
  Next steps:
  1. SSH into the VM
  2. Run: ~/start-app.sh
  3. Wait for Docker build and model downloads
  4. Access: http://YOUR_IP:', string(parameters('webServerPort')), '
  
  Useful commands:
  - ~/check-status.sh   - Check system status
  - docker logs -f sh-learning-ai - View logs
  ===========================================')]

nextSteps.value: 1) SSH into VM  2) Run ~/start-app.sh  3) Wait for model downloads  4) Access web interface
